pages.text: All players who participated in the internal testing of the EMCWorld modpack are mascots, but their rights will be re-evaluated after public release. $(br2) Those who have made positive contributions to the development of the modpack and have made significant suggestions will be retained. $(br2) Mascot rights will no longer be provided after public release.

When entering the game, a dark blue welcome message will be displayed, and all players on the current server will receive the message. $(br2) When sending a message in chat, the parentheses next to it will have a special color, like this: $(br2)$(6)<$()Name$(6)>$() Message
